TopicTitle: WHAT HAPPENED TO THE MUN LAUNCH SITE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!?????

Articles.Content: What happened!!!!!!!!! I haven't played in a while and now its GONE!!!!!!

The mun launch site is for the Console edition if you have the history and parts pack. If you are on PC you should check your mods.

Also in career and science modes you need to unlock mining before it becomes available.

Edited April 28, 2021 by Chryssalid 8492

I think your post title could use some more explanation points.

In a serious note, I've never heard of a Mün launch site. Sounds like a cool idea!
Why would you make a poll before finding out what actually happened?
ohhhhhhhh right. I used to play on console. Thx for the help, hope they are some mods out there for the mun launch site
